did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: apers for Kris Esterberg's Fall 1990 course "Sex in Society" course discussing the expressions of sexuality in society as seen in several collections in the Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Papers for Kris Esterberg's Fall 1990 course "Sex in Society" course discussing the expressions of sexuality in society as seen in several collections in the Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections.
